vehicles.description: A large orange construction vehicle is parked on the left side of the road, partially obstructing the lane.
vehicles.explanation: This vehicle has reduced the available road width, which may affect the passage of self-driving cars and other large vehicles.

vehicles.description: A dark-colored sedan is parked on the left side of the road.
vehicles.explanation: The sedan remains stationary and does not immediately affect the driving behavior of this vehicle, but it indeed reduces the available road width, which requires attention.

vulnerable_road_users.description: Up ahead on the left, there is a person on a bicycle heading in the opposite direction of this vehicle.
vulnerable_road_users.explanation: When driving, you must give cyclists adequate space because they are vulnerable road users.

other objects.description: There are several blue trash bins on the right.
other objects.explanation: These objects are located off the road and do not obstruct the current driving route, but attention should be paid to them in case they accidentally move or spill onto the road.

general_perception.description and explanation:
In the traffic image, there are a few notable road users and objects. Firstly, there is a large orange construction vehicle parked on the left side of the road, which is partially obstructing the lane. This vehicle has reduced the available road width, potentially affecting the passage of self-driving cars and other large vehicles. Additionally, a dark-colored sedan is also parked on the left side of the road. While it is stationary and does not immediately affect the driving behavior of the autonomous vehicle, it does reduce the available road width and requires attention.

Furthermore, there is a person on a bicycle up ahead on the left, heading in the opposite direction of the autonomous vehicle. It is important when driving to give cyclists adequate space because they are considered vulnerable road users.

Lastly, there are several blue trash bins located on the right side of the road. These bins are off the road and do not obstruct the current driving route. However, it is important to remain vigilant and pay attention to them in case they move or spill onto the road.

There are no traffic signs, traffic lights, traffic cones, or barriers present in the image that affect the driving behavior of the autonomous vehicle.

driving_suggestion: Slow down to ensure a safe distance when bypassing parked construction vehicles and cyclists. Be prepared to respond to sudden movements from motorcyclists and other road users who may not be visible in the scene. Continue to monitor the road ahead for any traffic signs or changes in road conditions, and adjust your driving behavior accordingly. Drive carefully, maintaining a safe distance from parked construction vehicles and cars, ensuring to slow down to have enough reaction time in case construction vehicles start moving or any unexpected objects suddenly appear on the road. Pay attention to any changes in speed or direction of motorcyclists, and be ready to give way when necessary. The vehicle should also be vigilant for any activity around parked vehicles and garbage containers to avoid any accidental obstacles or pedestrians.

1.description and explanation: A heavy piece of construction machinery likely used for roadwork or other heavy-duty tasks. As this type of vehicle can be slow-moving and may make unexpected movements, the ego car needs to maintain a safe distance and be prepared to stop or maneuver around it.

2.description and explanation: A waste container typically found at the side of the road to collect refuse. It should be stationary, but the ego car must ensure they do not drive too close to it to avoid any potential obstructions or hitting it inadvertently.

3.description and explanation: An automobile that seems to be parked on the side of the road. The ego car should be cautious to check for any signs of movement or doors opening as there may be passengers exiting or entering the vehicle.

4.description and explanation: An object used for people to sit on, usually found indoors or in designated outdoor seating areas but it is placed unusually on the side of a street here. The driver must be alert to the unexpected location of such an item as it may indicate the presence of pedestrians or irregular activity ahead.

5.description and explanation: A dustbin appears on the side of the road. While this inanimate object poses no immediate threat to the vehicle's path, it indicates an area where pedestrians may be present to dispose of trash, which requires the driver to stay vigilant and potentially slow down to account for pedestrian movement around this object.
